Headline: #4 Cottage Grove Temporary Northbound Reroute near Cottage Grove/75th
ShortDescription: Northbound 4 Cottage Grove buses are temporarily rerouted via Cottage Grove, 76th, Greenwood and South Chicago: due to, street blockage near Cottage Grove/75th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #4 Cottage Grove buses are temporarily rerouted via Cottage Grove, 76th, Greenwood, South Chicago and over regular route, due to street blockage near Cottage Grove/75th.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #87 87th Temporary Eastbound Reroute near 87th/Baltimore
ShortDescription: Eastbound 87 87th buses are temporarily rerouted via 87th, Houston, 90th, Buffalo and 91st: due to, street blockage near87th/Baltimore.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #87 87th buses are temporarily rerouted via 87th, Houston, 90th, Buffalo and 91st: due to, street blockage near87th/Baltimore.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Headline: Red Line Service Resuming Normal Routing
ShortDescription: Red Line service is resuming its normal routing, via the subway, btwn Fullerton & Cermak-Chinatown after an earlier reroute.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line service is resuming its normal routing, via the subway, between Fullerton & Cermak-Chinatown.

Trains were temporarily rerouted via the elevated lines due an earlier unauthorized person on the tracks.

Allow extra travel time.
